game.name: Super Cabbage Kabumi
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 양배추를 톡톡 때리는 로그라이크! 다양한 아이템으로 놀라운 빌드를 만들고, 강력한 무기를 휘두르며, 펫으로 게임을 완전히 바꾸고, 환상적인 보스와 싸우는 등 즐길 거리가 가득합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The roguelike all about bonking cabbages! Make incredible builds with a vast array of items, wield powerful weapons, change the game entirely with pets, fight fantastical bosses, and so much more!

reviewHighlights.text: I mean.... I don't normally write reviews but seeing as there isn't one yet, why not. The mechanics are janky and unbalanced, the numbers are complete...
This game is addictive! Super Cabbage Kabumi is so good! The pinball-like gameplay is easy to pick up, but it stays interesting because of all the uni...
